description: Rollout will start with care home residents and staff, health and social care workers and those over 80.
title: Covid-19: Preparation for NI vaccination programme in December
title_page: Covid-19: Preparation for NI vaccination programme in December - BBC News
maintext: "By Spring 2021, those who are over 50, who have not yet got it, should get it and by summer 2021 we hope to see that mass programme rolled out to the wider public," she added.
